targets.query:
from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: -3m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "cpu" and
        r._field == "usage_user"
    )
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: -3m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "cpu" and
        r._field == "usage_system"
    )
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: -3m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "extraInfo" and
        (r._field == "ssh_sessions")       
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "processes" and
        r._field == "total"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "sysName"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "temp" and
        r._field == "temp"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.description: The average, over the last minute, of the percentage of time that this processor was not idle.

targets.query:
from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "cpu" and
        r._field == "usage_user"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: CPU Utilization (USR)

targets.query:
from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "net" and
        r._field == "bytes_recv" 
        )
    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "net" and
        r._field == "bytes_sent" 
        )
    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.description: The average, over the last minute, of the percentage of time that this processor was not idle.

targets.query:
from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "cpu" and
        r._field == "usage_system"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: CPU Utilization (SYS)

targets.query:
from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "netstat")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tcp_time_wait" or r["_field"] == "tcp_syn_sent" or r["_field"] == "tcp_syn_recv" or r["_field"] == "tcp_none" or r["_field"] == "tcp_listen" or r["_field"] == "tcp_last_ack" or r["_field"] == "tcp_fin_wait2" or r["_field"] == "tcp_fin_wait1" or r["_field"] == "tcp_established" or r["_field"] == "tcp_closing" or r["_field"] == "tcp_close_wait" or r["_field"] == "tcp_close")
 
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "cpu" and
        r._field == "usage_iowait"     
        )
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 4.0 })) //calculate per CPU core value
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "eth0")
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "eth0")
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

panels.description: The average, over the last minute, of the percentage of time that this processor was not idle.

targets.query:
from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "extraInfo" and
        r._field == "temp2"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Temp 2

panels.description: The average, over the last minute, of the percentage of time that this processor was not idle.

targets.query:
from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "extraInfo" and
        r._field == "temp3"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Temp 3

targets.query:
from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "mem" and
        r._field == "used_percent"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and (r._field == "swap_free" or r._field == "swap_total"))
    |> group(columns:["_time"])
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with usedMem: float(v: float(v:(r.swap_total-r.swap_free)) / float(v:r.swap_total))}))
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "swap_free","swap_total","_time"])

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "mem" and
        r._field == "used"    
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: -3m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "disk" and
        r._field == "used_percent"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "fstype", "mode", "device", "sysName"])

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "extraInfo" and
        (r._field == "w2clients" or r._field == "w5clients")       
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and (r._field == "swap_free" or r._field == "swap_total"))
   // |> group(columns:["_time"])
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: (r.swap_total-r.swap_free))}))
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "swap_free","swap_total"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket:"labBucket")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "extraInfo" and
        (r._field == "connections_active")       
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
